analysis.description:

Lima.version should be constant (/unique_chucks/25/0x3f90421fd22b7e3251c8600430acc82922d2a434.sol#129-130)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/25/0x3f90421fd22b7e3251c8600430acc82922d2a434.sol#178-180:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/25/0x3f90421fd22b7e3251c8600430acc82922d2a434.sol#180:
